I would want to see the outcome of my actions and decisions to ensure that I am making the best choices for my life.
I would want to see the progression of my career and personal growth to ensure that I am on the right path.
I would want to see the happiness and well-being of my loved ones to ensure that I am doing everything in my power to support them.
I would want to see the future of the world and society to understand how my actions and decisions may impact the future.
I would want to see the possibilities and opportunities that the future holds to ensure that I am always looking forward to new experiences and challenges.
